notes: This emerged from a GPT-5 chat while writing my Substack essay 'Building in Plain Sight' -- I realized I need to start logging writing the same way I do the other 3, a gap in my process that was exposed by the very system I was writing.
todos: Extract meta lessons from writing each day which will help me in future essays
highlights: Learned a lot from GPT-5 and Claude, especially how to use them to balance each other as dual witnesses with different base approaches
